description: I am a Front-End Developer with over a year of experience in the industry. I have acquired solid skills in both front-end and back-end, expanding my knowledge base. I am now eager for new opportunities to further enhance my know-how and tackle new professional challenges.

mr-fish.title: Mister Fish
mr-fish.description: Mister Fish is an e-commerce website that sells frozen products. The site was built with React and Redux for the front-end and Firebase with Node.js for the back-end. Users can register, log in, add products to the cart, and complete an order.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio is a static website built with React. You can view my projects, read their descriptions, and visit the project website.

fermento.title: Fermento 2.0 Cefalù
fermento.description: Fermento 2.0 Cefalù is a showcase website for a pizzeria, featuring an online reservation system. It includes an admin dashboard to manage reservations and customers, as well as a mobile app for managing bookings and customer data.

bassi.title: Bassi Fondenti
bassi.description: Bassi Fondenti is a showcase website for a pizzeria

web-development.title: Web Development
web-development.description: Development of responsive and high-performance websites using the latest technologies and best practices.

web-design.title: Web Design
web-design.description: Design of intuitive and attractive user interfaces to ensure an optimal user experience.

mobile-cross.title: Mobile Cross-Platform
mobile-cross.description: Development of cross-platform mobile applications with React Native to reach a wide audience.
